entry.lex: AmeriGas is located in King of Prussia, Pennsylvania which is in the North American Eastern Time Zone. AmeriGas is working in the United States which has a total area of 9,833,516.63 square kilometers.

The entertainment company, GMA New Media, is based in Quezon City. It, and its subsidiary, Philippine Entertainment Portal, offer World Wide Web services.
GMA New Media, located in the city of Quezon, produces web services and develops applications for the entertainment industry. Philippine Entertainment Portal, Inc. is a subsidiary of GMA New Media.
GMA New Media is an entertainment industry maker of websites headquartered in Quezon City. Philippine Entertainment Portal is a GMA New Media subsidiary.

entry.lex: Hypermarcas which produces pharmaceutical drugs, is location in Sao Paulo, Brazil. President of the Supreme Federal Court is one of the leaders in Brazil.
Sao Paulo, Brazil is the location of Hypermarcas. This drug company is under the rule of the President of the Supreme Federal Court (title of Brazil's leader).
Hypermarcas is located in Sao Paulo, Brazil. Their main product is drugs, and their leader has the title of President of the Supreme Federal Court.
Hypermarcas is located in Sao Paulo and has 10,252 employees. They make healthcare products and their revenue is $1,800,000,000.
